metadata.job_title: Senior Data Engineer â€“ Commerce Data Pipelines

seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 3+ years of data engineering experience, which aligns with senior-level expectations.

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on ETL pipelines, data modeling, and SQL/performance tuning.

sub_specialty.evidence: Core focus on Snowflake or Redshift (warehouse technologies) and ETL design/development.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include partnering with business/analytics teams and performance tuning, suggesting technical leadership without direct reports.

primary_cloud.evidence: No explicit mention of AWS, Azure, or GCP services in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL orchestration tools (Airflow or similar) and scheduled pipeline mentions imply batch processing focus.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly mentioned as a must-have or nice-to-have ETL orchestration tool.

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake or Redshift mentioned as required storage technologies, with no lakehouse or lake-specific tools.

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid work model with specific US state restrictions (WA, CA, NY) and onsite requirements implies same-region restriction.

timezone_focus.evidence: No explicit timezone requirements mentioned beyond location restrictions.

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model with onsite days suggests candidate must already be in the region (Santa Monica, CA/Seattle, WA/NYC).

h1b_friendly.evidence: Pass 1 states 'All valid EADs except OPT, CPT, H1B', explicitly excluding H1B sponsorship.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Pass 1 explicitly excludes OPT and CPT in work authorization requirements.

citizenship_required.evidence: Work authorization text mentions 'GC, USC, All valid EADs' but does not require US citizenship.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Pass 1 states 'W2 only' in the job posting description (no C2C or 1099).

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits discussed in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career growth paths, tracks, or advancement opportunities in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No explicit or implied mentorship signals in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions or advancement paths in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned or implied.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Pass 1 shows a long list of must-have hard skills (9) with minimal nice-to-have skills (2), indicating strict requirements.

scope_definition.evidence: Job posting and Pass 1 results focus on well-defined data engineering responsibilities (ETL, data modeling, SQL tuning).

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Must-have skills align with senior-level expectations (3+ years of experience, advanced SQL/ETL tuning).
